TEXT.English: The Matriarch trait focuses on your heroes. To get its full potential, recruit as many heroes as you can and unleash them on your enemies!
TEXT.French: Le trait Matriarche se concentre sur vos héros. Pour en débloquer tout le potentiel, recrutez autant de héros que possible et lâchez-les sur vos ennemis!
TEXT.German: Diese Eigenschaft fokussiert auf Ihre Helden. Um ihre Potenzial voll nutzen zu können, bauen Sie so viele Helden wie möglich auf und setzen Sie sie auf Ihre Feinde frei!
TEXT.Italian: The Matriarch trait focuses on your heroes. To get its full potential, build as many heroes as you can and unleash them on your enemies!
TEXT.Spanish: The Matriarch trait focuses on your heroes. To get its full potential, build as many heroes as you can and unleash them on your enemies!

TEXT.English: [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Level 1: When Orthus enters Erebus, it goes to the Clan, but still spawns at a random location on the map.[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Level 2: Orthus gets the Escape ability, and your Heroes get Fire affinity. [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Level 3: Your Heroes get the Commander unit class and a commanding ability.
TEXT.French: [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Niveau 1: Quand Orthus arrive sur Erebus, il rejoint le Clan, mais apparaît toujours à un endroit aléatoire de la carte.[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Niveau 2: Orthus reçoit la capacité Évasion, et vos héros reçoivent une affinité pour le mana de feu. [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Level 3: Vos héros deviennent de classe Commandant et gagnent une capacité de commandement.
TEXT.German: [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Niveau 1: Als Orthus kommt auf Erebus, er kommt als ein Held des Klans, aber noch auf einer zufälligen Stelle.[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Niveau 2: Orthus bekommt die Entrinnen Fähigkeit, und Ihre Helden bekommen Feuerverwandschaft. [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Niveau 3: Ihre Helden bekommen den Kommandantseinheitstyp und eine Kommandantsfähigkeit.
TEXT.Italian: [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Level 1: When Orthus enters Erebus, it goes to the Clan, but still spawns at a random location on the map.[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Level 2: Orthus gets the Escape ability, your Heroes get Fire affinity. [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Level 3: Your Heroes get the Commander unit class and a commanding ability.
TEXT.Spanish: [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Level 1: When Orthus enters Erebus, it goes to the Clan, but still spawns at a random location on the map.[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Level 2: Orthus gets the Escape ability, your Heroes get Fire affinity. [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Level 3: Your Heroes get the Commander unit class and a commanding ability.

TEXT.English: The spectral horsemen your trait gives you will grow even more powerful if you build a strong cavalry and train your adepts in necromancy.
TEXT.French: Vos cavaliers fantômes deviendront plus forts si vous créez une puissante cavalerie et formez vos adeptes à la nécromancie.
TEXT.German: Die spektrale Reiter Ihre Eigenschaft gibt Ihnen werden stärker, wenn Sie eine mächtige Kavallrie ausbauen und Ihre Adepten in Nekromantie trainieren.
TEXT.Italian: The spectral horsemen your trait gives you will grow even more powerful if you build a strong cavalry and train your adepts in necromancy.
TEXT.Spanish: The spectral horsemen your trait gives you will grow even more powerful if you build a strong cavalry and train your adepts in necromancy.

TEXT.English: [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Level 1: your Palace provides Nightmare, your Mounted units are Illusions. [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Level 2: your Mounted units can fly and heal while moving. [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Level 3: all your summoned units are considered as mounted units, gaining the same bonuses as your cavalry.
TEXT.French: [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Niveau 1: vous bénéficiez de la ressource Cauchemar via votre palais, vos unités montées sont des Illusions. [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Niveau 2: vos unités montées volent et se soignent en se déplaçant. [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Niveau 3: toutes vos unités invoquées sont considérées comme des unités montées et reçoivent les mêmes bonus que votre cavalerie.
TEXT.German: [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Niveau 1: Ihren Palast gibt Ihnen Höllenpferde, Ihre Kavallerieeinheiten sind Illusionen. [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Niveau 2: Ihre Kavallerieeinheiten fliegen und heilen sich wenn sie bewegen. [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Niveau 3: beschworene Einheiten sind ale Kavallerie betrachtet und bekommen daher die dazugehörige Bonusse.
TEXT.Italian: [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Level 1: Your Palace provides Nightmare, your Mounted units are Illusions. [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Level 2: Your Mounted units can fly and heal while moving. [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Level 3: all your summoned units are considered as mounted units, gaining the same bonuses as your cavalry.
TEXT.Spanish: [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Level 1: Your Palace provides Nightmare, your Mounted units are Illusions. [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Level 2: Your Mounted units can fly and heal while moving. [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Level 3: all your summoned units are considered as mounted units, gaining the same bonuses as your cavalry.

TEXT.English: [NEWLINE] Detlesias was one of the best students in the Brookden Academy of magic. Considering this, it is not surprising to see him attain a high rank in the Dural administration. However, like many other powerful mages, his advanced research in magic left the Half-elf pyromancer a bit... disturbed. [NEWLINE] How could the wise Dural let a mad wizard become their leader? Even he may not know the answer to this question. One thing is sure though: whatever happens, he is not going to give up his position now. And he shall burn down everyone who would dare to stand on his way.
TEXT.French: [NEWLINE] Detlesias was one of the best students in the Brookden Academy of magic. Considering this, it is not surprising to see him attain a high rank in the Dural administration. However, like many other powerful mages, his advanced research in magic left the Half-elf pyromancer a bit... disturbed. [NEWLINE] How could the wise Dural let a mad wizard become their leader? Even he may not know the answer to this question. One thing is sure though: whatever happens, he is not going to give up his position now. And he shall burn down everyone who would dare to stand on his way.
TEXT.German: [NEWLINE] Detlesias was one of the best students in the Brookden Academy of magic. Considering this, it is not surprising to see him attain a high rank in the Dural administration. However, like many other powerful mages, his advanced research in magic left the Half-elf pyromancer a bit... disturbed. [NEWLINE] How could the wise Dural let a mad wizard become their leader? Even he may not know the answer to this question. One thing is sure though: whatever happens, he is not going to give up his position now. And he shall burn down everyone who would dare to stand on his way.
TEXT.Italian: [NEWLINE] Detlesias was one of the best students in the Brookden Academy of magic. Considering this, it is not surprising to see him attain a high rank in the Dural administration. However, like many other powerful mages, his advanced research in magic left the Half-elf pyromancer a bit... disturbed. [NEWLINE] How could the wise Dural let a mad wizard become their leader? Even he may not know the answer to this question. One thing is sure though: whatever happens, he is not going to give up his position now. And he shall burn down everyone who would dare to stand on his way.
TEXT.Spanish: [NEWLINE] Detlesias was one of the best students in the Brookden Academy of magic. Considering this, it is not surprising to see him attain a high rank in the Dural administration. However, like many other powerful mages, his advanced research in magic left the Half-elf pyromancer a bit... disturbed. [NEWLINE] How could the wise Dural let a mad wizard become their leader? Even he may not know the answer to this question. One thing is sure though: whatever happens, he is not going to give up his position now. And he shall burn down everyone who would dare to stand on his way.

TEXT.English: Study magic, train your magicians and burn down your enemies. That is all what matters for a powerful pyromancer.
TEXT.French: Étudiez la magie, entraînez vos magiciens et réduisez vos ennemis en cendres. C'est là tout ce qui compte pour un puissant pyromancien.
TEXT.German: Studieren Sie Magie, trainieren Sie Ihre Zäuberer und brennen Sie Ihre Feinde nieder. Für einen mächtigen Pyromant ist das alles was Wert ist.
TEXT.Italian: Study magic, train your magicians and burn down your enemies. That is all what matters for a powerful pyromancer.
TEXT.Spanish: Study magic, train your magicians and burn down your enemies. That is all what matters for a powerful pyromancer.

TEXT.English: [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Level 1: your Palace provides Fire Mana, your units with Fire 2 can cast Ring of Flames.[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Level 2: You can Ignite Pyres in your cities, your units with Fire 3 can cast Pillar of Fire. [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Level 3: Your Fireballs, Fire Elementals and Pyre Zombies gain extra strength and explode on death.
TEXT.French: [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Level 1: your Palace provides Fire Mana, your units with Fire 2 can cast Ring of Flames.[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Level 2: You can Ignite Pyres in your cities, your units with Fire 3 can cast Pillar of Fire. [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Level 3: Your Fireballs, Fire Elementals and Pyre Zombies gain extra strength and explode on death.
TEXT.German: [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Level 1: your Palace provides Fire Mana, your units with Fire 2 can cast Ring of Flames.[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Level 2: You can Ignite Pyres in your cities, your units with Fire 3 can cast Pillar of Fire. [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Level 3: Your Fireballs, Fire Elementals and Pyre Zombies gain extra strength and explode on death.
TEXT.Italian: [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Level 1: your Palace provides Fire Mana, your units with Fire 2 can cast Ring of Flames.[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Level 2: You can Ignite Pyres in your cities, your units with Fire 3 can cast Pillar of Fire. [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Level 3: Your Fireballs, Fire Elementals and Pyre Zombies gain extra strength and explode on death.
TEXT.Spanish: [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Level 1: your Palace provides Fire Mana, your units with Fire 2 can cast Ring of Flames.[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Level 2: You can Ignite Pyres in your cities, your units with Fire 3 can cast Pillar of Fire. [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Level 3: Your Fireballs, Fire Elementals and Pyre Zombies gain extra strength and explode on death.

TEXT.English: Gives your melee and arcane units first strike and defensive strike chances. Once improved, it gives them collateral damage as well.
TEXT.French: Donne des chances de première attaque et de frappe défensive à vos unités de mêlée et vos adeptes. L'affinité améliorée leur donne aussi des dégâts collatéraux.
TEXT.German: Gibt eure Nahkampfeinheiten und Adepten Verteidigungsschlag- und Erstschlagchancen. Die verstärkte Affinität gibt ihnen auch Kollateralschaden.
TEXT.Italian: Gives your melee and arcane units first strike and defensive strike chances. Once improved, it gives them collateral damage as well.
TEXT.Spanish: Gives your melee and arcane units first strike and defensive strike chances. Once improved, it gives them collateral damage as well.

TEXT.English: What does a good warleader do? She makes sure her soldiers are well supervised with competent officers and petty officers and experienced commanders, and that they overcome their enemies.
TEXT.French: Que fait un bon chef de guerre ? Elle s'assure que ses soldats sont encadrées par des sous-officiers et officiers compétents et par des commandants expérimentés, et qu'ils vainquent leurs ennemis.
TEXT.German: Was macht eine gute Kriegsführerin? Sie sichert sich, dass ihre Soldaten von kompetenten Offiziere und Unteroffiziere und erfahrene Kommandanten betreut werden, und dass sie ihre Feinde besiegen.
TEXT.Italian: What does a good warleader do? She makes sure her soldiers are well supervised with competent officers and petty officers and experienced commanders, and that they overcome their enemies.
TEXT.Spanish: What does a good warleader do? She makes sure her soldiers are well supervised with competent officers and petty officers and experienced commanders, and that they overcome their enemies.

TEXT.English: [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Level 1: free promotion Corporal (disciples, melee units).[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Level 2: commanders receive +1 command limit and give their minions +10% XP gain. Level requirements for chain of command promotions are reduced.[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Level 3: Commanders and their minions receive +25% withdrawal chance.
TEXT.French: [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Niveau 1 : promotion gratuite Caporal (disciples, unités de mêlée).[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Niveau 2 : vos commandants reçoivent +1 d'extension d'unités et donnent à leurs subordonnés +10% de gain d'expérience. Les conditions de niveau pour les promotions de la chaîne de commandement sont réduites. [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Niveau 3 : Vos commandants et leurs subordonnés reçoivent 25% de chances de retraite.
TEXT.German: [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Stufe 1: freie Beförderung Korporal (Geweihten, Nahkampfeinheiten).[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Stufe 2: Kommandanten bekommen +1 Befehligenzahl und geben ihren Untergeordneten +10% Erfahrungsverdienst. Die Stufenanforderungen für die Befehlskette sind reduziert.[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Stufe 3: Kommandanten und ihre Untergeordnete bekommen +25% Rücktrittchancen.
TEXT.Italian: [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Level 1: free promotion Corporal (disciples, melee units).[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Level 2: commanders receive +1 command limit and give their minions +10% XP gain. Level requirements for chain of command promotions are reduced.[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Level 3: Commanders and their minions receive +25% withdrawal chance.
TEXT.Spanish: [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Level 1: free promotion Corporal (disciples, melee units).[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Level 2: commanders receive +1 command limit and give their minions +10% XP gain. Level requirements for chain of command promotions are reduced.[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Level 3: Commanders and their minions receive +25% withdrawal chance.
